AUTHOR_PRESENTS: Radosław 'Doic' Michalak presents a text game titled
QUIT_GAME: Are you sure you want to end the game?
THANKS_FOR_PLAYING: Thank you for playing the demo version of the game. I hope you had a great time.
NAME: Name
JOURNAL.ENTRY: New quest added to the journal
JOURNAL.NO_QUESTS: You do not have any quests in your journal.
INVENTORY.NO_ITEMS: You do not have any items in your inventory.
INVENTORY.TIP:
[TIP: This item has been added to your inventory. You can view it in the text file in your
	game folder.]
INVENTORY.SELECT_INDEX: Select the index of the item you want to view.
ITEM.AD13.NAME: Accelerator D-13
ITEM.AD13.DESCRIPTION: A long out of use accelerator model. However, it can still be quite precious.
ITEM.ACCESS_CARD.NAME: Access card
ITEM.ACCESS_CARD.DESCRIPTION: It definitely matches the door leading to the locked room in Hex Folstam's office in 'Eden' club.
WEAPON.PISTOL.NAME: Pistol
WEAPON.PISTOL.DESCRIPTION: A simple weapon that shoots pure energy.
QUEST.KILL_HEX.NAME: Beauty and the Beast
QUEST.KILL_HEX.DESCRIPTION: Kill the owner of 'Eden' nightclub, Hex Folstam, at the request of his girlfriend, Luna.
QUEST.ZED_ACCELERATOR.NAME: Relic of the Past
QUEST.ZED_ACCELERATOR.DESCRIPTION: Bring Zed an old accelerator model. In exchange you will receive a pistol from him.
INTRO_02:
Megacity is a place overrun by poverty and feuding gangs, where powerful
	corporations have the most influence. The violence in the streets is a clear sign of
	an impending war. Government operating from behind the secure walls of City Hall are
	trying to combat this, but so far without success. There are rumors that they themselves
	are secretly supporting the chaos to create a New Order on the ruins of the city.
INTRO_03: Standing at the edge of the tallest tower...
INTRO_05: Falling and falling for what feels like hours...
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_01: You wake up dazed from a restless slumber.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_02: It was the same dream again...
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_03:
You are somewhere in a dark alley. Above your head, among the smoggy haze, as if torn from
	a dream, rise the monumental skyscrapers of large corporations.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_04:
Their divine majesty beats
	you to the eyes.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_05:
Your heart beats so hard that only the stinging touch of the wind protects you from a sudden
	heart attack.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_06:
Suddenly a wave of shivers comes over your body, you start shaking like an
	aspen, and realize that you are lying on a lair made of some old newspapers.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_07: When you rise from the ground, you notice a sea of trash around you.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_08:
It's full of cardboard
	boxes, old mechanical parts, and god knows what else.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_09: Maybe you will find something interesting there...
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_MENU.LOOK_OUT: Search the area for something valuable.
DARK_ALLEY.WAKE_UP_MENU.FIND_EXIT: Find the exit from the alley.
DARK_ALLEY.FINDING_ACCELERATOR_01: You start rummaging through the trash.
DARK_ALLEY.FINDING_ACCELERATOR_02:
The search takes a long while, but eventually you
	manage to find something.
DARK_ALLEY.FINDING_ACCELERATOR_03: Hmm, that might come in handy in the future.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_01: Nie masz zamiaru grzebać w śmieciach.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_02: I dobrze, pewnie i tak nic byś tam nie znalazł.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_03:
Zamiast
	tego powoli podążasz w kierunku neonowych bomb na końcu alejki.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_04: Powoli podążasz w kierunku neonowych bomb na końcu alejki.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_05:
Jesteś coraz bliżej celu, gdy z prawej strony, zza zasłony cieni, odzywa się niski, niezbyt
	przyjemny głos należący do mężczyzny.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_06: Zatrzymujesz się i odwracasz w stronę właściciela głosu.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_07:
Jego sylwetka majaczy w ciemności. To
	jeden z bezdomnych, którzy tu mieszkają. Co takiego może dla ciebie mieć?
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_08: Za nic masz tajemniczego nieznajomego. Przyspieszasz kroku i zostawiasz go daleko za sobą.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_09: To, czego od ciebie chciał, nie jest już istotne.
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_MENU.FIND_OUT: (Zatrzymaj się i dowiedz się, czego chce.)
DARK_ALLEY.OUT_OF_ALLEY_MENU.FIND_OUT_FI: (Zatrzymaj się i dowiedz się wreszcie, czego chce.)
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_01: Cienie przed tobą zaczynają falować, gdy twój rozmówca wstaje.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_09: - Nie chcesz mówić? Dobra, niech ci będzie, ale może chociaż zdradzisz mi, co tu robisz?
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_10: - Haha, tak właśnie myślałem. Prawdę mówiąc, nie wyglądasz zbyt groźnie.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_11:
Przydałaby ci się
	jakaś broń. Znam gościa, który handluje bronią. Ma na imię Zed, jego sklep jest tuż za rogiem.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_12: Powiedz mu, że przychodzisz od starego Boba, a on na pewno coś dla ciebie znajdzie.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_16:
Cóż, to tutaj. Okolica,
	w której teraz jesteśmy, jest nazywana Rajem Utraconym.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_18:
- Mylisz się. To absolutnie moja sprawa, dzieciaku. Nie mów do mnie w ten sposób, jeśli nie
	chcesz stracić kilku zębów. Rozumiesz?
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_19: - Nie pokazuj się tu więcej, jeśli nie chcesz stracić zębów!
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_20:
W końcu z ciemności wyłania się stara, pomarszczona twarz, otoczona szarą plamą. Sztuczne,
	cybernetyczne oko czujnie cię obserwuje.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_22: W jednej chwili alejkę wypełnia wycie policyjnej syreny.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_23:
Na ścianie przed tobą czerwony
	i niebieski zaczynają ze sobą tańczyć.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_26: No, super. Chyba na mnie już czas.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_27: Starzejący się żebrak błyskawicznie zanurza się w objęciach ciemności.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_28:
Czy to oznacza, że
	widzisz go po raz ostatni?
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_30: Widziałem kręcących się w pobliżu gliniarzy. Przestało tu być bezpiecznie, przynajmniej dla mnie.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_31: Ciesz się, że nie zostało nam więcej czasu.
DARK_ALLEY.DIA_BOB_MENU_01.LUST_LOOKING_: Tylko się rozglądam. Gdzie my właściwie jesteśmy?
DARK_ALLEY.PARADISE_LOST_MENU.TELL_ME_MO: Nie bardzo. Opowiedz mi o tym Raju Utraconym.
DARK_ALLEY.ABOUT_PARADISE_LOST_03:
Megacity zbudowano na zgliszczach miasta, które
	zostało zniszczone przeszło dwie dekady temu w wyniku wybuchu bomby atomowej.
DARK_ALLEY.ABOUT_PARADISE_LOST_04:
Nikt już nie
	pamięta jego nazwy, ale wiadomo, że było to jedno z ważniejszych miast starego świata.
DARK_ALLEY.ABOUT_PARADISE_LOST_05: Robotnicy nazwali tę dzielnicę Rajem Utraconym właśnie na jego część.
DARK_ALLEY.ABOUT_PARADISE_LOST_06:
Niby-ludzie ze Śródmieścia
	nigdy tego nie zrozumieją.
DARK_ALLEY.CROSSROADS_01: Po wejściu do zaułka słyszysz znajomy głos.
DARK_ALLEY.CROSSROADS_02: - To znowu ty. Może tym razem coś mi powiesz?
DARK_ALLEY.CROSSROADS_03: Po wejściu do zaułka zauważasz wokół siebie morze śmieci.
DARK_ALLEY.CROSSROADS_04: Nie ma tu nic ciekawego. Czas wracać...
STREET.LOOK_AT_EDEN_01:
Wychodzisz z zaułka na ulicę oświetloną neonami po przeciwnej stronie. Duży szyld z napisem
	'Eden' należy do klubu nocnego.
STREET.LOOK_AT_EDEN_02:
Przed wejściem do budynku gromadzi się mały tłum. Kilka osób
	kłóci się z bramkarzami.
STREET.LOOK_AT_EDEN_03: Coś tu śmierdzi, to pewnie kłopoty...
STREET.LOOK_AT_EDEN_04:
Wychodzisz z zaułka na ulicę oświetloną neonami i światłem radiowozu po przeciwnej stronie.
	Duży szyld z napisem 'Eden' należy do klubu nocnego.
STREET.LOOK_AT_EDEN_05:
Przed wejściem do budynku dwóch policjantów
	przesłuchuje mały tłumek.
STREET.LOOK_AT_EDEN_MENU.COME_CLOSER: (Podejdź bliżej i sprawdź, o co chodzi.)
STREET.ENCOUNTER_GUN_STORE_01: Idziesz prawą stroną ulicy. Po przejściu kilkunastu metrów napotykasz małą budkę między blokami.
STREET.ENCOUNTER_GUN_STORE_02: Czy to może być ten słynny sklep z bronią prowadzony przez przyjaciela starego Boba?
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_01: When you get closer, the faces turn toward you and start looking at you intently.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_02:
You pass
	them in silenceand are confronted by a broad-shouldered security guard.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_05: The man clenches his hands into fists and smiles unpleasantly.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_06: - 'You asshole, better let us in! I want a drink and for fuck's sake. I'm losing my patience!'
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_07: One of the men waiting in the queue rushes forward and threatens the bouncer with his fist.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_08: The security guard's attention shifts from you to the furious guy next to you.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_SECURITY_GUARDS_09: - 'I'll say it one last time: get the fuck out of here or you'll get fucked.'
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_01: When you get closer, one of the police officers in a dark blue uniform turns toward you.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_02: In an instant the street is filled with the howling of a police siren.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_03:
The reds and blues
	begin to dance with each other on the sidewalk and the silhouettes of the people around you.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_04:
Two grim-looking guys in dark blue uniforms get out of a police car and walk towards you.
	One of them points at you, taking out a tablet from behind his belt.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_06: And what are you doing here? Please show me your ID card.'
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_07:
You start searching through the pockets of your jacket and pants, but other than the accelerator
	you found in the trash, there's nothing else there.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_08: You start searching through the pockets of your jacket and pants, but there's nothing there.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_09: - 'I see that we have a problem.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_10: Okay, then what's your name, citizen?
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_11: Caden, check it out in the database.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_12:
Caden, check
	it out in the database.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_13: And you, stand where you are.'
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_14:
The other police officer nods, gets back in the car, and it looks like he's connecting with
	headquarters.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_15: A minute later, the same policeman returns and whispers something in his partner's ear.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_16:
That
	one nods and turns to look at you.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_18:
You're free for now, just don't let it occur to you to do
	something here, or you'll end up in arrest at the police station.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_19:
Caden, take care of the
	rest of the attendees.'
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_20: The cop walks away to talk to the nearest person standing.
STREET.MEETING_WITH_POLICEMANS_22: The bouncer points to the door behind him.
STREET.CROSSROADS_01: Once again you are on a street bathed in nighttime darkness.
STREET.START_RAINING_01: You feel single drops hitting you.
STREET.START_RAINING_02:
It's hard to say if it was going to rain before, but it
	looks like you're gonna get wet.
STREET.START_RAINING_03: It only takes a moment for a downpour to fall on the area.
STREET.NICK_HAND_DISCOVERED_01: You are almost at the exit of the alley when your foot encounters something hard.
STREET.NICK_HAND_DISCOVERED_02:
You stop and
	lower your gaze to the obstacle.
STREET.NICK_HAND_DISCOVERED_03:
It turns out to be a bloody hand. Next to it lie handcuffs
	attached to a suitcase.
STREET.NICK_HAND_DISCOVERED_04: A small inscription 'Nick Rinaldi' is engraved on it.
STREET.NICK_HAND_DISCOVERED_05:
It was probably
	the property of some corporate yuppie.
STREET.NICK_HAND_DISCOVERED_06: Someone must have made a nice profit at his expense.
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_01: Somewhere from the side a laugh reaches your ears.
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_02:
It belongs to two women glued to the wall
	of a neighbouring edifice.
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_03: Their skimpy attire immediately betrays their profession
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_04:
- they
	are a pair of local prostitutes.
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_05:
One of them finally spots herself and starts waving her hand
	in your direction.
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_06: - 'Hey, sunshine, do you happen to have a cigarette and some fire on you?'
STREET.HOOKERS_MEETING_07:
Before you have time to reply, she moves sensuously towards you and her friend tries to keep
	up with her.
STREET.PUNKS_AMBUSH_01: Somewhere from the side a laugh reaches your ears.
GUN_SHOP.ENTER_01: The front door hisses open before you.
GUN_SHOP.ENTER_02:
You step over the threshold and enter a small room
	with a counter opposite the entrance. Behind it stands a tall, thin man with fatigue painted
	on his terribly oblong face.
GUN_SHOP.ENTER_03:
He is dressed in an old corporate commando suit. On the wall
	behind his back hangs a lot of weapons.
GUN_SHOP.ENTER_04: - 'How can I help you, my friend?'
GUN_SHOP.ENTER_05: From behind the counter, Zed is already smiling atyou.
GUN_SHOP.ENTER_06: - 'What's up? How's the gun working out?'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_01: - 'Hey, what's up? Are you sclerotic or something? We already talked about this, haha!'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_02:
- 'What kind of question is that anyway? Business is doing great! Everyone stops by every now and then
	to rearm. It's the natural order of things.'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_03: - 'Yes, that is correct. I'm Zed, and this is my little shop.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_04:
Since you know Bob, you can get a small
	discount here.'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_07: I don't know where you found it, but now the gun is yours.'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_10:
rifles, pistols, machine guns, shotguns. I have a melee weapons
	as well. Knives, hammers, long blades like katanas...
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_12: Tell me, what do you like?'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_13: You have everything you need. There's no point in bothering Zed.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_14: Zed looks at you pityingly and shrugs his shoulders.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_15: - 'No problem. It can happen to anyone.'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_17: But don't worry, we'll sort it out somehow.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_18:
Hmm, you know Old Bob, that already
	means something.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_19: Let's just say I'll loan you this gun on a friendly basis.'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_20:
It so happens that I have been looking
	for a good accelerator for some time.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_21: I don't mean the crap produced by corporations these days.
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_22:
I mean the good
	old accelerator!
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_23: Find me such a device and you will get that gun. Okay?'
GUN_SHOP.DIA_ZED_24: - 'A pistol is a good start. Here, it's yours.'
NIGHTCLUB_EDEN.VISIT_CLUB: You enter from a fairly well-lit street into a slightly darkened nightclub, trembling with colour.
MISC.REMEMBER_YOUR_NAME:
Your name... You start wandering your thoughts around what your name is. As if through a fog
	it occurs to you that you are:
